description: This file defines a React component for the user registration page in a Next.js web application. It handles user input for registration details, performs validation, and simulates user registration by calling a login function, then redirects the user upon successful registration.

methods.name: RegisterPage
methods.description: React component rendering the registration form with validation and submission logic.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, validates input, performs registration by calling loginUser, and redirects on success.
